resources.string: Welcome to the Algeria Tourist Guide app. This app provides information about tourist attractions in Boumerdes and Algiers.
Boumerdes is a coastal city in northern Algeria, known for its beautiful beaches and natural landscapes. It offers various tourist attractions, hotels, and restaurants.
Algiers is the capital of Algeria, known for its whitewashed buildings, Ottoman palaces, and Mediterranean coastline. The city offers a rich blend of history, culture, and modern attractions.
